author: whitecapsO
description: Generic Farmware function to run sequences across two grids

config.name: rowsGrid1
config.label: Number of rows in first grid (0-20):

config.name: colsGrid1
config.label: Number of columns in first grid (0-20):

config.name: spaceBetweenRowsGrid1
config.label: The number of millimeters between each row to move the x axis in first grid:

config.name: spaceBetweenColsGrid1
config.label: The number of millimeters between each column to move the y axis in first grid:

config.name: startXGrid1
config.label: Where to start the x axis from in first grid:

config.name: startYGrid1
config.label: Where to start the y axis from in first grid:

config.name: startZGrid1
config.label: Where to start the z axis from in first grid:

config.name: sequenceAfter1stGridMove
config.label: Sequence to call after moving to a cell on the first grid:

config.name: alternateInBetweenGrid1
config.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between cells in first grid:

config.name: startLastRowOfGrid1
config.label: Whether to calculate alternate in between cells in first grid:
